name: The Bunny Graveyard: Chapter 2 - Terror in Carrot Town
summary:
Terror in Carrot Town is the working title for Chapter 2 of the horror adventure game, The Bunny Graveyard.

Chapter 2 has started development and will follow Skye the Bunny with a different moveset and more gameplay options then the previous chapter. Plans are for the story to get darker but still have wacky moments and fun minigames throughout a more connected world map with a less linear path through the story.
